oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Confederate officer John W. Estes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: CDV of former Tennessee state legislator and Confederate officer John W. Estes, taken at T. F. Saltsman's photography studio in Nashville (Tenn." Estes served as captain (later Lt. Col.) of Co. H, 52nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Col. Estes enlisted at Henderson Station on Dec. 19, 1861 and served for a time as chief provost marshall of North Alabama. He was wounded at the Battle of Atlanta and died in the Ocmulgee Hospital at Macon (Ga.) in Nov. 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Estes, John W.
